person.persName: John J. Berry (Louisville, Kentucky, drayman and cooper)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, drayman, driver, and cooper. Virginia native. Married to Sallie Ann Willhoite Berry in Oldham County, Kentucky, on July 15, 1854. Father of Isabelle Berry, Alice Berry, and Florence Berry. Attended school in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1850. Drayman in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Driver in Louisville in 1861. Cooper in Louisville in 1865.
